## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.defaultValue property

The default value for the accordion. This is the initial value to be set if no other value is provided.


 {<!-- -->T \| T\[\] \| null<!-- -->} The default selected value(s).

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly defaultValue: import("@angular/core").ModelSignal<T | T[] | null>;
```
